headline: Super Micro (SMCI) and Dell (DELL), IBM (IBM), Cisco (CSCO), Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) Shares Are Soaring, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks jumped in the afternoon session after markets rallied sharply on news that President Trump announced a 90-day tariff pause. Reciprocal tariffs were also dropped to 10% for most countries, sparking renewed optimism amid ongoing trade talks. The major stock indices rose as investors, growing impatient of seemingly irrational tariff actions, welcomed the pause as a sign of a more measured path forward.

headline: Wall Street Lunch: Trump Yields To Bond Market
summary: In a massive U-turn, President Donald Trump let most countries off the hook from the large tariffs he announced last week, instead zeroing in on an escalating battle with China.

headline: 3 Storage Devices Stocks to Keep an Eye on in a Thriving Industry
summary: Amid a volatile macro backdrop, momentum in cloud computing, IoT, auto and AI is likely to favor the prospects of Zacks Computer - Storage Devices industry players like SMCI, NTAP, and QMCO.

headline: 5 Stocks With Robust Sales Growth to Buy Amid Tariff Headwinds
summary: Against extreme market volatility, the traditional stock picking method - sales growth - is apt. Stocks like MTH, ZM, EIX, SMCI and COHR are worth buying.
